title: Ashy Bines puts her $2million waterfront mansion on the Gold Coast up for rent
text:
Advertisement

Fitness influencer Ashy Bines is known for her enviable figure and glamourous lifestyle.

And on Tuesday, the 30-year-old fitness fanatic put her luxurious $2 million waterfront mansion on the Gold Coast up for rent.

Renters will need to put down a $10,000 bond and fork out $2,500 a week to stay at the home, which features a pool, cinema and built-in aquarium.

A pool, cinema and built-in aquarium: Fitness model Ashy Bines (pictured) has put her $2million waterfront mansion on the Gold Coast up for rent

Lavish living: Renters will need to put down a $10,000 bond and fork out $2,500 a week to stay at the home, which features a pool (pictured), cinema and built-in aquarium

The Bines abode is located in the affluent suburb of Broadbeach Waters and has a pontoon to access the area's canals by boat.

At 804 square metres, the spacious home has six bedrooms and six bathrooms, including a master suite complete with a walk-in wardrobe, ensuite and outdoor shower.

There are two more master bedrooms that can be used as guest rooms as well as three smaller children's rooms.

Something's fishy! The office features an aquarium, which wraps around the wall while there is also a large media room that has a projector for watching movies

Spacious: At 804 square metres, the spacious has six bedrooms and six bathrooms, including a master suite (pictured) complete with a walk-in wardrobe, ensuite and outdoor shower

The high-tech kitchen comes with stone benches and Fisher & Paykel appliances and looks out onto the pool and waterway.

Meanwhile, the living area opens up onto the deck, garden and pool to create a sense of open-plan living.

There is also a media room with a large projector to watch movies and an office that features an aquarium, which wraps around the wall.

Views: The high-tech kitchen comes with stone benches and Fisher & Paykel appliances and looks out onto the pool and river

Family home: The 30-year-old influencer was living in the six-bedroom home with her husband Steven Evans (pictured), 40, and their four-year-old son Taj (pictured)

Ashy bought the colossal house for $1.955 million in 2013 and tried to sell it earlier this year but failed to find a buyer, according to CoreLogic.

In August, the house passed in at auction with a $2.495 million asking price. It is now listed for more than $2.25 million.

The influencer was previously living in the six-bedroom home with her husband Steven Evans, 40, and their four-year-old son Taj.

Ashy has a global following with over 840,000 Instagram followers and more than 15 million YouTube views.
description: She's the fitness influencer known for her glamourous lifestyle.
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
